Name: Dere-chat
About the game: A Visual Novel prequel to the upcoming Wifu-Box! If you want to get a taste of the future game or just want to help support us with development give Dere-chat a go! I'll be working on more content updates so if you have any suggestions or requests let me know! 'Sweet dreams Senpai..' Meet Dere-chan, one of the five starter-wifus in this interactive visual novel with 35 story branches, 150 unique lines of dialogue, unlockable skins and many wholesome vibes! Dere-chan is always kind, happy, and energetic so whatever happens she'll always be there with kindness and support! Episodes for Kuu-chan, Dan-chan, Tsun-chan and Yan-chan are planned for the future so stay tuned!
